Bash: jat-signal review '{"taskId":"jat-ngzc5","taskTitle":"Replace Browser Extension with Embeddable Feedback Widget","summary":["Created widget/ directory with Svelte 5 custom element (<jat-feedback>) built via Vite IIFE lib mode","Ported extension logic: sensitive data filter, selector generator, console capture, element picker","Built API client with localStorage offline queue (30s retry, max 50 entries) and html2canvas screenshot capture","Built 5 Svelte components: FeedbackButton, FeedbackPanel, ScreenshotPreview, ConsoleLogList, StatusToast","Created /api/feedback/report endpoint with CORS headers and OPTIONS preflight","Built widget (293KB / 80KB gzipped) and served from ide/static/widget/jat-feedback.js","Replaced Browser Extension card with Feedback Widget card on integrations page (script tag, config, Cloudflare Tunnel guide)","Deleted extension/ directory and ide/src/routes/api/extension/ (download + report endpoints)"],"filesModified":[{"path":"widget/","changeType":"added","linesAdded":1500,"linesRemoved":0},{"path":"ide/src/routes/api/feedback/report/+server.js","changeType":"added","linesAdded":226,"linesRemoved":0},{"path":"ide/static/widget/jat-feedback.js","changeType":"added","linesAdded":1,"linesRemoved":0},{"path":"ide/package.json","changeType":"modified","linesAdded":1,"linesRemoved":0},{"path":"ide/src/routes/integrations/+page.svelte","changeType":"modified","linesAdded":120,"linesRemoved":172},{"path":"extension/","changeType":"deleted","linesAdded":0,"linesRemoved":5000},{"path":"ide/src/routes/api/extension/","changeType":"deleted","linesAdded":0,"linesRemoved":400}],"testsStatus":"not_run","buildStatus":"clean","reviewFocus":["Widget builds successfully as single IIFE file","Integrations page shows Feedback Widget card with copy-to-clipboard snippet","Cloudflare Tunnel instructions included for production use"]}'
